name: Dialog
tagline: An awesome lightweight jQuery plugin for creating overlay dialogs.
body:
about the plugin ======= Use the dialog plugin for creating beautiful overlay dialog boxes. You can open multiple dialogs at once, and see all of them awesomely stacked one behind the other giving it an unique look and feel. features ======= * Show overlay dialogs * Open and stack multiple dialogs on top of already open dialogs * Custom heading and controls for dialogs * Close dialogs on press of 'Esc' key or on blur installation ======= Installation is super easy. Just follow these steps: Add the jQuery library to your page. Add the dialog script file to your page. Finally, add the dialog css file to your page. That's it.!! Easy right ? Now, go ahead and use the plugin to create awesome dialog boxes. how to create dialogs using this plugin ======= Nothing special needs to be done.
